title: A Tactical Blueprint To Building Generational Wealth With D.K. Hutch
itunes:title: A Tactical Blueprint To Building Generational Wealth With D.K. Hutch
description:
Did you learn about long-term investments or 401Ks in school? No? We didn’t think so. Now is the time to figure out how to manage your financial health for the long term. It’s just as important as making the money in the first place.

3gf9tbvt

D.K. Hutch is a virtually self-taught, financial expert and CEO of The Legacy Company. He understands the ins and outs of managing your personal finances and making smart investments. D.K.’s hunger for knowledge, extensive experience, and diverse skill set have allowed him to excel in his career. 

 

On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and D.K. break down the basics of insurance, investing, trading cryptocurrency, and how to grow your existing assets. D.K. explains the various levels of risk and reward that come with dispersing your money and which options are best to help it grow. Listen in for an episode that will get your finances in order.

 

Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/dk-hutch
 
Get More Involved:

  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
